DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy prize contingency management ( CM ) enhance attendance , reduce drug use , improve health among client attend two HIV drop-in center . Specifically , 172 client randomly assign one two 6-month treatment condition : standard 12-step oriented group treatment , CM group treatment . In CM group , client earn chance win prize submit clean urine specimen comply step toward treatment goal . Activities related improve health emphasize , attend medical appointment , record daily medication consumption , get prescription fill , attend medication adherence support group . Group attendance , drug use , medical problem , service receive , risky drug use sexual behavior measure pre-treatment month 1 , 3 , 6 , 9 12 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : HIVpositive member The Living Center Manchester Area Network AIDS DSMIV diagnosis current opioid cocaine abuse dependence willingness accept random assignment one two treatment group Exclusion criterion : inability comprehend study ( Minimental status score < 21 ; Folstein & Folstein , 1975 ; inability pas inform consent quiz ) severely disruptive behavior recovery pathological gambling ( due potential similarity CM procedure gamble ) nonEnglish speaking
